about_the_game:
Fasten your belts and prepare for a whimsical racing experience like no other as you embark on a journey through famous virtual tracks! Choose from two near to realistic muscle cars and one track in the Demo. Compete against yourself in the Time trial mode or set of AI opponents in high-speed, adrenaline-fueled races.

Embark on a thrilling single-player campaign filled with thrilling challenges and unlockable content. With stunning graphics, addictive gameplay, and endless opportunities for fun, this car racing game will keep you on the edge of your seat and coming back for more!
